title: Aen 2 45-48 - SS syllabus - Myth - Trojan horse

content.question: Which person developed the idea of the Trojan Horse (equo, line 4) as a means to break into the city of Troy?

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
